BirthdayDetail.astralChartDescription: View your personalized astral chart and life matrix.

NotFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found

WitchesSection.name: Name

dayOfWeekMeaning.Sunday: Ruled by the Sun. A day for personal growth and self-expression.
dayOfWeekMeaning.Monday: Ruled by the Moon. A day for nurturing, emotions, and reflection.
dayOfWeekMeaning.Tuesday: Ruled by Mars. A day for action, courage, and physical activity.
dayOfWeekMeaning.Wednesday: Ruled by Mercury. A day for communication, learning, and travel.
dayOfWeekMeaning.Thursday: Ruled by Jupiter. A day for expansion, luck, and abundance.
dayOfWeekMeaning.Friday: Ruled by Venus. A day for love, beauty, and relationships.
dayOfWeekMeaning.Saturday: Ruled by Saturn. A day for discipline, responsibility, and structure.

elementDescription.Fire: Fire signs are passionate, energetic, and seek action.
elementDescription.Earth: Earth signs are practical, stable, and seek security.
elementDescription.Air: Air signs are intellectual, communicative, and seek new ideas.
elementDescription.Water: Water signs are emotional, intuitive, and seek deep connection.

WitchesSection.selectUser: Select a user to view their astral chart and destiny matrix
